From Moraga, Paula. (2023). Spatial Statistics for Data Science: Theory and Practice with R. Chapman & Hall/CRC Data Science Series. ISBN 9781032633510ed

##  *Solanum* plant species in Bolivia

Here, we show how to formulate and fit a LGCP model for *Solanum* plant species in Bolivia using a continuously Gaussian random field with INLA and SPDE.
